SourceText: ParentText is easiest to use when you receive content as videos, images and text. However, your data bundle and bandwidth may not support videos. To save on data, you can opt to receive the same content with a smaller audio file or as text. How would you like to receive ParentText?
text: i-ParentText ilula kakhulu ukuyisebenzisa uma uthola umthamo wayo ngamavidiyo, izithombe kanye nemiyalezo ebhaliwe. Kodwa ke kungenzeka ukuthi i-data yakho noma ukudonsa kwe-network kungakweseki ekutholeni amavidiyo. Ukonga i-data ungakhetha ukuthola okuqukethwe yividiyo ngeziqephu ezimfishane ezishicilelwe ngephimbo noma ezibhaliwe. Ufisa ukuyithola ngaluphi uhlobo i-ParentText?

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
Is @fields.child_nickname a girl or a boy?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Is your child a girl or a boy?
text: Ingabe ingane yakho intombazane noma umfana?

SourceText: Which province do you live in?
Please provide us with your child's first name.
text: Sicela usinikeze igama lokuqala lengane yakho.

SourceText: Please type "N" if you prefer not to answer.
text: Sicela ubhale u â€œCâ€ uma ukhetha ukungaphenduli.

SourceText: âœ…Your personal information is safe and private. Your name and information will not be public, but your responses will be kept and used by researchers to learn how to support families like yours.  They plan to publish the results.
text: âœ…Imniningwane yakho yangasese iphephile  futhi iyimfihlo. Igama lakho neminye imniningwane yakho ngeke ibe sesidlangalaleni, kodwa izimpendulo zakho zizogcinwa futhi zisetshenziswe abacwaningi ukuze bafunde ukweseka imindeni efana neyakho. Bahlela ukushicilela imiphumela.

SourceText: âŒYou can stop when you want. Just type {STOP}
text: âŒUngayeka uma ufuna. Vele uthayiphe ukuthi {STOP}

SourceText: Press YES if you agree with this. Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
text: Cindezela â€œYEBOâ€ uma uvumelana nalokhu. Bhala â€œPHUMAâ€ uma ungathandi ukubamba iqhaza.

SourceText: That is wonderful, thank you so much!
Can you please confirm that you are 18 years old or older?
text: Sicela uqinisekise ukuthi uneminyaka eyi-18 ubudala noma ngaphezulu?

SourceText: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
text: Uqinisekile ukuthi awufuni ukuthola le milayezo? Uma ungasafuni ukuthola eminye imilayezo, sicela ubhale ukuthi CHA. Uma wenze iphutha, sicela ucindezele EMUVA bese ukhetha okunye.

SourceText: If you ever return to participate in the programme, type "HELLO".
text: Uma kwenzeka ubuya uzohlanganyela ohlelweni, bhala ukuthi "SAWUBONA".

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
text: Sithembe ukuthi sizokubona maduzane, futhi sikufisela usuku olunenjabulo nokuthula!

SourceText: Sorry, ParentText is only for people over the age of 18. Do you confirm that you are under the age of 18?
text: Siyaxolisa, i-ParetText ngeyabantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kweyi-18 kuphela. Ingabe uyakuqinisekisa ukuthi ungaphansi kweminyaka eyi-18 ubudala?

SourceText: If you want to experience ParentText, you can always share it with your parents or caregivers.
text: Uma uthanda ukusebenzisa i-ParentText, ungakuxoxa nabazali noma abanakekeli bakho.

SourceText: Here is a video that shows how to use ParentText.
text: Nansi ividiyo ebonisa indlela yokusebenzisa i-ParentText.

SourceText: When was @fields.child_nickname born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Wazalwa nini @fields.child_nickname? Faka usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa ngalendlela elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: When was your child born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Wazalwa nini @? Faka usuku lwabo lokuzalwa ngefomethi elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.

SourceText: Sorry, this date is invalid. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Siyaxolisa, lolu suku akulona. Sicela unikeze usuku lokuzalwa lwengane yakho ngalendlela elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.

SourceText: The date you entered is in the future. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Usuku olifakile isesikhathini esizayo. Sicela unikeze usuku yokuzalwa yengane yakho ngale ndlela elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.

SourceText: Let's try again. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Ake sizame futhi. Sicela unikeze usuku lokuzalwa lwengane yakho ngale ndlela elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.

SourceText: @fields.child_nickname is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. Is that correct?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your child is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. Is that correct?
text: Ingane yakho ineminyaka engu-@(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)). Ingabe lokho kuliqiniso?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: @fields.child_nickname is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old.  Is that correct?
text: i-@fields.child_nickname ineminyaka engu-@(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) yobudala. Ingabe kuyikho lokho?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your teen is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old.  Is that correct?
text: Osemusha wakho uneminyaka engu-@(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)). Ingabe lokho kuliqiniso?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: According to the date you provided, @fields.child_nickname would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. ParentText is only for children aged 2-17. Please enter a valid date for your child's birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Ngoko suku olinikezile, @fields.child_nickname izoba @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) iminyaka yobudala. I-ParentText eyezingane ezineminyaka esukela ku-2-17 kuphela. Sicela ufake usuku okuyiloi lokuzalwa kwengane yakho ngefomethi elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: According to the date you provided, your child would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. ParentText is only for children aged 2-17. Please enter a valid date for your child's birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Ngoko suku olinikezile, @fields.child_nickname izoba @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) iminyaka yobudala. I-ParentText eyezingane ezineminyaka esukela ku-2-17 kuphela. Sicela ufake usuku okuyiloi lokuzalwa kwengane yakho ngefomethi elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Welcome to ParentText! This chatbot has been designed with and for parents just like you. We hope you find it useful!
text: Wamukelekile kuParentText! Leli robhothi elikhulumayo lakhiwe ngabazali futhi lakhelwe abazali abafana nawe. Sithemba ukuthi uzolithola liwusizo!

SourceText: ParentText will help you with all of the children in your life, but in this programme, we are focusing on just one child at a time.
text: I-ParentText izokusiza ngazo zonke izingane empilweni yakho, kodwa kulolu hlelo sigxile enganeni eyodwa ngesikhathi.

SourceText: Would you like to go back to the previous messages?
That's okay. Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines.
text: Kulungile. Bhala ukuthi {USIZO} noma nini uma ungathanda imininingwane yamasevisi ezimo eziphuthumayo noma amanye ama-hotline.

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local emergency services:
text: Nansi imininingwane yokuxhumana nezindawo zangakini zosizo oluphuthumayo:

SourceText: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!
text: Bhala ukuthi {HELP} noma nini uma ungathanda imininingwane yamasevisi ezimo eziphuthumayo noma amanye ama-hotline. Khumbula konke okushoyo kuzoba yimfihlo ngokuphelele!

SourceText: If you ever feel like talking privately to a trained professional, you can call:
text: Uma uzizwa sengathi ufuna ukukhuluma ngasese nomuntu oqeqeshiwe, ungashayela:

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local medical services:
text: Nansi imininingwane yokuxhumana nezindawo zangakini zosizo lwezempilo:

SourceText: Are you currently facing an emergency?
Do you need some support with an emotional issue?
text: Ngabe udinga usizo mayelana nesimo esikuthinta emoyeni?

SourceText: Are you currently experiencing a health issue?
Are you experiencing an unsafe situation?
Do you need some urgent help?
I might know some resources that can help. Would you like information for:
text: Kungenzeka ngazi amathuluzi angasiza. Ungaluthanda ulwazi lo:

SourceText: Please look after yourself! Your local clinic can help you with all health issues. If you need more support, here are some free helplines:
text: Sicela uzinakekele! Umtholampilo oseduze nawe ungakusiza ngezinkinga zokuphila. Uma udinga ukwesekwa, nazi izincingo zamahala zosizo:

SourceText: Seeing and experiencing violence can be a scary and confusing time. There are people who can help you and your child through this!
text: Ukubona nokubhekana nodlame kungaba isikhathi esithusayo. Kukhona abantu abangasiza wena nengane yakho!

SourceText: Feeling sad or stressed, or your child's behaviour is difficult? These places can help you:
text: Uzizwa uphansi noma ukhathazekile, noma imphatho yengane yakho inzima? Lezi zindawo zingakusiza:

SourceText: Family life is difficult! Did you know the social workers at your local Department of Social Development can help with parenting skills, fatherhood, teenage pregnancy, and family and relationship counselling? If you don't have a DSD office nearby, this support will be offered by NGOs in your area:
text: Impilo yomndeni inzima! Ubuwazi ukuthi osohlalakahle kuMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi eduze nawe bangakusiza ngamakhono obuzali, ukuba ngubaba, ukumitha kwentsha, nokwelulekwa komndeni nobudlelwano? Uma lingekho i-ofisi eliseduze, ungathola usizo kuNGO eseduze nawe:

SourceText: So much of our energy goes to helping the person struggling with substance abuse. While this is important, you and the rest of the family need support too! Find support for everyone below:
text: Amandla amaningi ethu asekusizeni umuntu ohlulwa izidakamizwa. Njengoba lokhu kubalulekile, wena nomndeni wakho nidinga ukwesekwa futhi! Thola ukwesekwa ngezansi:

SourceText: Legal and SASSA issues can be stressful and confusing! There might be more support than you realise at the organisations below:
text: Izinkinga zomthetho neSASSA ziyakhathazana! Kungenzeka kubenokwesekwa okwengeziwe ngaphezu kolwazi lwakho kulezizindawo ngezansi:

SourceText: Understanding sexual and gender development can be confusing and difficult to talk about. We are all unique! Here is some support and guidance:
text: Ukuqondisisa ukuthuthuka kwezocansi nobulili kungadidana futhi kube nzima ukukhuluma ngakho. Sonke sihlukile! Naku ukweseka nokwelulekwa:

SourceText: School is where your child spends most of their time. Making sure that they are in school, and happy and supported is so important. If you're struggling with any school issues, here is some help:
text: Ingane yakho ichitha isikhathi esiningi esikoleni. Kubalulekile ukuqiniseka ukuthi basesikoleni, bajabulile futhi bayasekwa. Uma uhlulwa izinkinga zesikole, nalu usizo:

SourceText: What would you like to do?
We hope this was helpful! You can access this information at any time by typing {HELP}.
text: Sithemba ukuthi lokhu kube usizo! Ungafinyelela kulolu lwazi noma nini ngokubhala ukuthi {USIZO}.

SourceText: Please type {MENU} to access resources and review completed modules, {PLAY} to receive a playful activity you can complete with your child, or {HELP} to access local support resources for a crisis.
text: Sicela ubhale ukuthi {MENU} ukuze ufinyelele izinsiza futhi ubuyekeze amamojuli aqediwe, {PLAY} ukuze uthole umsebenzi wokudlala ongawuqedela nengane yakho, noma {HELP} ukuze ufinyelele kwizinsiza zokukusekela zasendaweni zenhlekelele.

SourceText: You have not given consent to participate in this programme. Would you like to participate?
text: Awuhlinzekwanga ngemvume yokubamba iqhaza kulolu hlelo. Ungathanda ukubamba iqhaza?

SourceText: If you ever decide to participate in the programme, type HELLO.
text: Uma kwenzeka ufuna ukubamba iqhaza ohlelweni, bhala uthi Sawubona.

SourceText: Parenting is hard. ParentText may help. Would you like to continue your progress?
text: Ukukhulisa abantwana kunzima. i-ParentText ingasiza. Ungathanda ukuqhubeka nentuthuko yakho?

SourceText: That's okay. If you ever decide to come back, type HELLO.
text: Kulungile. Uma kwenzeka unquma ukubuya, bhala ukuthi SAWUBONA.

SourceText: You are already part of ParentText!
Staying in ParentText helps you and your child. Are you sure you want to exit the programme?
text: Ukuhlala ku-ParentText kusiza wena nengane yakho. Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukuphuma ohlelweni?

SourceText: If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "EXIT".
text: Uma ungasathandi ukuthola le miyalezo, sicela uthayiphe â€œPHUMAâ€.

SourceText: If you made a mistake, please type "BACK".
text: Uma wenze iphutha, sicela ubhale igama elithi "EMUVA".

SourceText: Thank you for participating. If you want to return to the programme, type HELLO.
text: Siyabonga ngokuhlanganyela. Uma ufuna ukubuyela ohlelweni, bhala ukuthi SAWUBONA.

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon!
This feature will be available once you have completed registration. It wonâ€™t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Lokhu kuzotholakala uma usuqedile ukubhalisa. Ngeke kuthathe isikhathi eside. Sicela uqhubeke nentuthuko yakho!

SourceText: The menu will be available once you have completed registration. It wonâ€™t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Imenyu izotholakala uma usuqedile ukubhalisa. Ngeke kuthathe isikhathi eside. Sicela uqhubekele phambili!

SourceText: In this course, you will complete @fields.c_n_mod lessons. You will receive a new lesson each day. Your first lesson is @results.name.
text: Kulesi sifundo, uzoqedela @fields.c_n_mod izifundo. Uzothola isifundo esisha usuku ngalunye. Isifundo sakho sokuqala sithi @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You have completed @fields.c_n_mod_compl out of @fields.c_n_mod lessons in this course. Today's lesson is @results.name.
text: Uqedele @fields.c_n_mod_compl ezifundweni ze-@fields.c_n_mod kulesi sifundo. Isifundo sanamuhla sithi @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Letâ€™s get started. Press NEXT to begin.
text: Ake siqale. Cindezela okuthi OKULANDELAYO ukuze uqalise.

SourceText: Well done. You're ready to start the programme.
There are no new courses available.
You only have the following course to start

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Would you like to begin this course?
Which new course would you like to start?

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You do not have have a current course.
You only have the following course started
Which unfinished course would you like to complete?
You only have the following course to complete
Great! Which unfinished course would you like to complete?
You only have the following lesson to complete:
Which lesson would you like to complete?
You haven't started to work on a course yet.
You have only started the course
Would you like support on it?
That's okay. You can access more information at any time in the Main Menu. Just type {MENU}.
text: Kulungile. Ungafinyelela olwazini olwengeziwe nganoma yisiphi isikhathi kwi menyu nkulu. Vele ubhale ukuthi {Menyu}.

SourceText: You haven't completed a lesson yet.
Which course do you want to review?

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.count is a number (counter for list)

SourceText: You haven't completed any of the lessons in this course.
text: Awukaqedi noma yiziphi izifundo kulesi sifundo.

SourceText: You have only completed the following lesson:
Would you like to review it?
That's okay. You can come back here at any time to review it.
text: Kulungile. Ungabuya lapha noma nini ukuzolibuyekeza.

SourceText: You have completed @fields.n_s_modules_compl lessons within this course. Which lesson do you want to review?
text: Usiqedile isifundo se-@fields.n_s_modules_compl kulezi zifundo. Isiphi isifundo ofuna ukusibuyekeza?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.count is a number (counter for list)

SourceText: You have seen all the courses
Itâ€™s time to pick a new course! You have completed @fields.n_goals_completed of @fields.n_goals_prog courses. Which course would you like to work on next?
text: Isikhathi sokukhetha isifundo esisha! Usuqede @fields.n_goals_completed ku @fields.n_goals_prog wezifundo. Ungathanda ukwenza siphi isifundo esilandelayo?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You have completed @fields.n_goals_completed of @fields.n_goals_prog courses. Which course would you like to work on next?
text: Usuqede @fields.n_goals_completed ku @fields.n_goals_prog wezifundo. Ungathanda ukwenza siphi isifundo esilandelayo?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: What would you like to do next?
What kind of activity do you want to try with your teen?
text: Imuphi umsebenzi ofuna ukuwuzama nengane yakho?

SourceText: What kind of activity do you want to try with your baby?
text: Iziphi izinto ofuna ukuzizama nengane yakho?

SourceText: What kind of activity do you want to try with your child?
text: Iluphi uhlobo lomsebenzi ofuna ukuwuzama nengane yakho?

SourceText: Do you want to begin now or tomorrow?
text: Ingabe ufuna ukuqala manje noma kusasa?

SourceText: It takes only 5 days to complete this course and earn your parenting certificate.
text: Kuthatha izinsuku ezi-5 kuphela ukuqeda lesi sifundo futhi uzuze isitifiketi sakho sokuba ngumzali.

SourceText: ğŸ‰You did it!ğŸ‰ You have completed the course @results.name. Here's your course certificate. Congratulations!
text: ğŸ‰Uphumelele!ğŸ‰ Usiqedile isifundo @results.name. Nasi isitifiketi sakho. Halala!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Remember, you can always return to ParentText and get extra support or review this information. Just type {MENU}.
text: Khumbula, ungakwazi njalo ukubuyela ku-ParentText futhi uthole ukwesekwa okwengeziwe noma ubuyekeze lolu lwazi. Vele ubhale ukuthi {MENU}.

SourceText: ParentText has begun. You are just 5 days away from earning your parenting certificate. Are you ready to complete your registration and get started?
text: IParentText isiqalile. Usalelwe yizinsuku ezi-5 kuphela ukuthi uzuze isitifiketi sakho sokuba ngumzali. Ingabe usukulungele ukuqedela ukubhalisa kwakho futhi uqalise?

SourceText: Press a number on your keypad:
Youâ€™re off track! Do you want to complete your previous unifinished lesson or start a new lesson?
text: Awukho endleleni! Ingabe ufuna ukuqedela isifundo sangaphambilini noma ukuqala isifundo esisha?

SourceText: Do you want to catch up and proceed to the next lesson?
text: Ingabe uyafuna ukuqhubeka futhi uqhubekele esifundweni esilandelayo?

SourceText: You're almost finished with this course! You only have 1 unfinished lesson. What would you like to do?
text: Usuzoqeda ngalesi sifundo! Unesifundo esisodwa esingaqediwe. Ungathanda ukwenzani?

SourceText: 1. Finish this lesson and earn my course certificate
text: 1. Qeda lesi sifundo futhi uzuze isitifiketi sesifundo

SourceText: You're almost finished with this course! You have @fields.c_n_mod_started unfinished lessons. What would you like to do?
text: Usuzoqeda ngalesi sifundo! Una-@fields.c_n_mod_started wezifundo ezingaqediwe. Ungathanda ukwenzani?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 1. Complete unfinished lessons to earn my course certificate
text: 1. Qedela izifundo ezingakaqedwa ukuze uthole isitifiketi sesifundo

SourceText: It's time to get started on ParentText. Are you ready?
Press a number on your keypad:
I've got another lesson ready for you! Are you ready?
These messages donâ€™t seem to be working. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.
text: Sengathi le miyalezo ayisebenzi. Uma usukulungele ukuqhubeka, cindezela u-1.

SourceText: You have not completed a course yet.
You have completed the following course:

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You have completed the following courses:
There are no other courses to complete.
You have the following courses still available:
You have not begun the following courses:
You are on track to complete the entire ParentText programme! There are no new courses to start!
text: Usuthubeni lokuqeda lonke uhlelo lweParentText! Azikho izifundo ezintsha ezizoqala!

SourceText: You have the following course available:
You have the following courses available:
We hope this was helpful! You can access the Main Menu at any time by typing {MENU}.
text: Sithemba ukuthi lokhu kube usizo! Ungakwazi ukufinyelela I-Main Menu nomanini ngokubhala ukuthi {MENU}.

SourceText: Your relationship status has been updated. You've unlocked a new course: @results.name.
text: Ubudlelwano bakho bubuyekeziwe. Uvule isifundo esisha: @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: To invite someone to join, share this link!
text: Ukuze umeme othile ukujoyina, thumela le-link!

SourceText: You have reached the end of this lesson! ğŸ‰
What do you want to do next?
That's okay. You can access more information at any time in the Main Menu.
text: Kulungile. Ungafinyelela ulwazi olwengeziwe nganoma yisiphi isikhathi kwi-Menyu enkulu.

SourceText: ğŸ‰You did it! Congratulations!ğŸ‰ You have completed all the available courses. Well done!
text: ğŸ‰Usebenzile! Halala!ğŸ‰ Uziqede zonke izifundo ezitholakalayo. Wenze kahle kakhulu!

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
